title: Queentoshi
author: Queentoshi
content: I do not know if this has been discussed before, but I want to know why most discussions on sports asides tennis is about the men's side of it and the women side is about only barely mentioned. Take football for example. Why is there low engagement in women sports from the side of viewers and even gamblers who are sports bettors? Is it not easier to win on gambling on women sports than men's sport? or is there no gambling site offering odds for betting on women sports?

comments.author: rdluffy
comments.body: I'm going to talk about soccer, which is the sport I bet onThis year I bet a lot on the Women's World Cup, there was even an official thread here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5455617.0I remember that at the beginning everyone thought it was going to be a championship with full of matches with more than 8 goals, easy etc, but the championship surprised everyone with difficult matches, with the favorites being disqualified, and even had an unprecedented championThe reason, I think, is simple: lack of popularity, but it's being improved.It used to be more difficult to watch the women's matches, but this year it was broadcast on the internet, so it was well publicized, broke records for the number of users watching, and I think there was even a record prize for the winningLittle by little, women's sports are gaining more popularity and that's very goodThe World Cup was a great example where supposedly weaker countries managed to play on equal terms with the stronger onesTalking only about the bets, it was a very difficult championship to predict, many matches surprised me, but I still made a good profit

WNBA had been selling out their tickets in the playoffs and now in the Finals so it's somehow improving.

comments.body: Quote from: Queentoshi on October 10, 2023, 01:38:11 PMI do not know if this has been discussed before, but I want to know why most discussions on sports asides tennis is about the men's side of it and the women side is about only barely mentioned. Take football for example. Why is there low engagement in women sports from the side of viewers and even gamblers who are sports bettors? Is it not easier to win on gambling on women sports than men's sport? or is there no gambling site offering odds for betting on women sports?Female sports are not popular in many countries. In fact, many people don't watch female games in my location because they see it as a waste of time. I think it also has some cultural and religious undertone. Most cultures or religions don't give women the privilege or freedom to express themselves. In some nations, females are barred from engaging in some sports and this will discourage investors from gambling firms. Another issue is that you can't compare the quality of male sports and female games. The male competition is more serious, exciting and entertaining. Sometimes female sports are so boring that you might even sleep off watching them. But this doesn't mean that there are no interesting female matches.All sports are unpredictable so we cannot assume that female games are easier to predict. An example is the just concluded World Cup when some African nations defeated a few highly rated female teams. Popular games like the female World Cup are also covered by some gambling houses but I have never bet on them.

Moreover, this forum is open without selecting men and women, it's just that the discussion of topics is mostly made by men, so there are lots of discussions about men's sports, personally I don't follow women's sports betting.

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: My reasoning for avoiding women's sports is the same as betting on tennis it's too unpredictable or competitive than what you'd expect. I remember betting on the Women's Champions League a few months ago, and when it came to the playoffs, you can never trust the big favorites to secure the win most of the time (even with the home advantage). The amount of upsets that happened was too much, i'd better switch to a different sport and go back to the leagues that i'm more familiar with before I lose most of my profits and bankroll.
